summary: Medical case management app with task tracking for discharge items
architectural_notes: Case creation includes configurable task checklist with 7 medical discharge items
Tasks selected during creation persist and display as checkboxes on case cards

existing_features.title: Add checkboxes to the case creation form for seven task items: Discharge Notes (default checked), pDVM Notified (default checked), Labs (default unchecked), Histo (default unchecked), Surgery Report (default unchecked), Imaging (default unchecked), Culture (default unchecked)
Store only the tasks that were checked during case creation in the case data structure
Display only the tasks that were selected during case creation on the case card as open checkboxes that can be marked as complete

new_feature_requests.summary: Add task checklist when creating a case with 7 items (Discharge Notes, pDVM Notified, Labs, Histo, Surgery Report, Imaging, Culture) with specified defaults
Display selected tasks from creation on case card as open checkboxes
